question: Urgent please.I read in one hadist that if the wind is not smell, and no voice then no need to repeat wudhu', please give explaination. jazakallhu khair.
answer:
QUESTION
I live in Singapore where almost every where people use air conditioner (AC), so it will make a cold condition. If I feel cold then I will fart oftenly and of course it will cause problem when I want to pray. and I also still confuse with the hadist, please give explaination, Insya Allah. jazakallahu khair
ANSWER


Share:
We are unaware of such a Hadith. If wind comes out, then the Wudhu breaks.
This does not differ whether the wind smells or not.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
